We offer reliable KVM VPS solutions located at our Manchester Datacentre

Save 20% this weekend using code "jubilee20off" at the checkout! Offer ends 5th June!

Choice of pre installed OS templates

We provide you with a choice of OS you can use with your VPS. We provide templates for Centos 5.5 and 6.2, Debian 5.0, Fedora 13, Suse 11.3, Ubuntu 10.04LTS and 12.04LTS. You are free to reinstall the OS or swap templates any time you want via our control panel. You have total control and freedom over your virtual server.

Full access, when you want it, how you want it.

We provide you with full root access to your VPS and we also provide VNC access so you can access the server console to carry out maintenance etc. Our VPS control panel also allows you to install trial versions of some of the best known server control panels at the click of a mouse, including cPanel, Plesk, Webuzo, Kloxo and Webmin (licences not included)

Feature rich control panel

Our VPS control panel gives you full control of your VPS just as though it were a physical server. You can power on/off, reboot and reconfigure the server at the click of a button. Want to reinstall the OS or load the server console via VNC? No problem – just click.

For more information, see http://www.posilan.com/vps
